definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: He says nothing of it in the Second Epistle .
sentences.chinese: 他說，沒有它的第二次書信。

sentences.english: Interesting is the letter writing that they had to do.
sentences.chinese: 最有意思的是書信寫作。

sentences.english: Li Zhongming would burn up those drawings, he left home leave Yang Nian letters.
sentences.chinese: 黎仲明將那些圖紙燒燬，他臨走時給楊念留下書信。

sentences.english: This is begun in Unit 2. Carefully follow the instructions given under each passage.
sentences.chinese: 書信寫作從第2單元開始，仔細研究每課中的指令。

sentences.english: We write to each other often, even though we are a great distance apart.
sentences.chinese: 即使是相隔萬水千山，我們也頻繁書信往來。

sentences.english: But there are some interesting problems with this letter also.
sentences.chinese: 這封書信中也有很多有趣的問題。

sentences.english: These letters seem to be meant to be read out loud.
sentences.chinese: 這些書信似乎需要大聲朗讀出來。

sentences.english: We also know,though,about oral traditions in Paul's letters.
sentences.chinese: 我們也知道保羅書信的口傳傳統。

sentences.english: So the oldest material we have are the letters of Paul.
sentences.chinese: 所以最早的資料是保羅的書信。

sentences.english: Unifying the singing-to-reply and presenting-answer functions as one, his poems had the function of letters concurrently.
sentences.chinese: 同時，其將唱和與贈答功能合一，兼有書信作用。

sentences.english: For years you and Frau Schmitz have corresponded with each other.
sentences.chinese: 多年來您和施密茲夫人有着書信往來。

sentences.english: Are the Pastoral Epistles attacking this author?
sentences.chinese: 教牧書信是在攻擊這位作者嗎？

sentences.english: Plato wrote a series of letters that we have.
sentences.chinese: 我們握有柏拉圖所寫的一系列書信。

sentences.english: These are letters that date from the fourteenth century BCE.
sentences.chinese: 這些書信可追溯至公元前14世紀。

sentences.english: And, in every Epistle, he thanks God for his.
sentences.chinese: 並且，在他寫的每一卷書信中，都感謝神對。

sentences.english: A letter certified from court and welfare to the home for these cases.
sentences.chinese: 將由法庭或福利部發出一份證明書信給我們。

definition: to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
